annotations.document:
COLOR SCHEME:
- Primary: #1a73e8
- Error: #d93025
- Success: #188038
- Border: #dadce0
- Text: #202124
- Label: #5f6368

SPACING:
- Input padding: 8px 12px
- Label margin: 0 0 4px
- Error margin: 4px 0 0

TYPOGRAPHY:
- Label: 14px, 500 weight
- Input: 16px
- Error: 12px
